ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Digest Number 1477
ygData.msgSnippet: From all reports I ve seen - the speed variable is overflowing and rolling past 0.  I ve heard if you toggle to walk-you go at maximum speed. By the way - what
ygData.messageBody:
From all reports I've seen - the speed variable is overflowing and rolling
past 0. I've heard if you toggle to walk-you go at maximum speed.

By the way - what mob dropped it in SG - and what's it's location?

Thanks

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: Essam Khairullah [mailto:olgwinn@...]
Sent: Tuesday, September 11, 2001 8:59 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Digest Number 1477


I know you hate updates after you release a new version, but I just got
Drums of the Beast, and I can say with a certainty that Selo's Song of
Travel gives 0% run speed improvement while weilding it. In fact, and this
seems REALLY weird, I seem to run faster while singing it and weilding a
sword rather than that drum. I'm thinking it may actually be a negative
speed increase, but of course that's hard to quantify.

Olgwinn Pendragun
Crimson Legacy
54 Bard of E'ci
